name: sql-tools
description: olap for sql non-olap engines / and other tools
author: Codenautas <codenautas@googlegroups.com>

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks --globals json4allRegisteredTypes test/
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks --globals json4allRegisteredTypes test/
